thread.title: Man records the moment when his mother forgets who he is
thread.title_full: Man records the moment when his mother forgets who he is

title: Man records the moment when his mother forgets who he is
text:
Man records the moment when his mother forgets who he is 13 hours ago Next 
Dementia is devastating. Severe memory loss and impaired thinking put a huge stress on the person suffering from it as well as their family and friends. When his mother was diagnosed with dementia, this man decided to start a video blog to document their journey. But no amount of preparation and research could have prepared him for where that journey would lead. 0 Shares
